title: Roku Shares Tumble as Company Warns of Tough Holiday Season
description: Big advertisers “aren’t spending with anyone,” CEO Anthony Wood tells investors.

title: Instacart to Give First Companywide Cash Bonus After Delaying IPO
description: The cash bonus is a shift in the San Francisco company’s efforts to reward and retain employees.

title: Chip Maker Qualcomm Sees Smartphone Slump Worsening
description: The company issues a weaker outlook that adds to signs of stress for the semiconductor industry.

title: The Weird-Looking, Fuel-Efficient Planes You Could Be Flying In One Day
description: Engineers are exploring radical new designs for commercial planes that would use less energy and lower emissions. But will passengers be willing to board them?

title: Chinese iPhone City Locks Down to Curb Foxconn Covid Crisis
description: Local governor urges tighter restrictions as weekslong struggle to contain the virus in the Zhengzhou Airport Economy Zone leads to mounting worker desertions.

title: The Celebrities Leaving Twitter After Elon Musk's Takeover: See the List
description: A small but growing number of public figures say they’re quitting the platform over concerns of how it could change under its new owner.

title: Jony Ive on Life After Apple
description: The mastermind behind Apple’s most iconic products reveals how his design philosophy guides collaborations at his creative collective, LoveFrom.

title: Investors Pour Into Venture Capital Funds Even as Markets Cool
description: Limited partners who back venture funds still seek access to startups, which have outperformed other asset classes during recessions.

title: Musk Says Blocked Twitter Users Won't Be Allowed Back Until Process in Place
description: Elon Musk said he had spoken to civil-society leaders about how Twitter “will continue to combat hate & harassment & enforce its election integrity policies.”

title: Netflix With Ads Launching This Week
description: Disney, NBCU and Sony are among the companies still negotiating licensing with the streaming service, which says advertiser demand is strong.
